This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, during which you can return the product if it doesn't meet your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the exceptional benefits of our product! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
